name: Planet Defender (itch) (jopakka, Sc0rpiOn, thareeqroshan, GilbertMochi, King784)
name_original: Planet Defender (itch) (jopakka, Sc0rpiOn, thareeqroshan, GilbertMochi, King784)
description:
Planet Defender

The Earth is in danger! And you are the only one who can save it from the impending doom.

There is only one way to survive. You must fortify the planet! Place defensive towers around it to destroy incoming meteors. Surely with all this firepower your dearest Earth is never going to get destroyed... Right...?

Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Controls:

WASD: Camera movement

Mouse Wheel: Zoom

1, 2, 3: Select turret

Credits:

Coding: King784, Jopakka
Models: Sc0rpiOn
Music and sound design: thareeqroshan
Extra pair of hands: GilbertMochi
